subject:
Re: Disable the krb5 replay cache when ads_verify_ticket() call
	from winbindd_pam.c
body:
On Tue, Jun 05, 2007 at 02:06:39PM -0500, Gerald (Jerry) Carter wrote:
> 
> I have customers hitting this now so it's a real issue.
> Maybe this should be configurable and always use the rcache
> by default.  Comments ?

Looks good to me.

Jeremy.
